::Ramulus/Firearm::

Ramulus frowns at Prebon.

"He is a medic, named Wolfgang," the Maximal says, hoping that Lunarpine 
didn't act surprized. Ramulus was used to modifying the truth, so the false 
name came naturaly to him. "He is here to insure Striker and Spears are in 
good condition, and are not chipped. Now where is Striker?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
FIrearm was looking at Prebon's back from a fairly good distance away, all 
his weapons aimed at it. He didn't like relying on sight to aim, but any 
radio frequency or scanners might be detected.

He narrows his eyes further. He was actually hoping the Trainer would give 
him a reason to shoot...
